statements: SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicies WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM InsurancePolicies WHERE policy_type = 'Life';
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicies WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, insured_amount FROM InsurancePolicies WHERE policy_end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, premium_amount FROM InsurancePolicies WHERE is_active = FALSE ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicies WHERE policy_type = 'Life' ORDER BY policy_start_date DESC, premium_amount ASC
SELECT policy_holder_name, insured_amount FROM InsurancePolicies WHERE premium_amount > 1000 AND is_active = TRUE
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount, insured_amount FROM InsurancePolicies WHERE policy_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM InsurancePolicies WHERE is_active = TRUE AND policy_type = 'Auto' ORDER BY policy_start_date ASC
SELECT policy_holder_name, premium_amount FROM InsurancePolicies WHERE premium_amount > 500 AND (policy_type = 'Health' OR policy_type = 'Auto')
SELECT * FROM policies;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date, policy_amount FROM policies;
SELECT policy_number, policy_status FROM policies WHERE policy_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type, upload_date FROM documents;
SELECT * FROM policies;
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_number, policy_amount FROM policies ORDER BY policy_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_amount > 5000 AND policy_status = 'active';
SELECT policy_holder_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policies WHERE policy_holder_name LIKE '%John%' AND policy_status = 'active';
SELECT p.policy_holder_name, d.document_type, d.upload_date FROM policies p JOIN documents d ON p.policy_id = d.policy_id ORDER BY d.upload_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_holders
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM policy_holders ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT * FROM policy_details WHERE premium_amount > 1000
SELECT policy_type, start_date, end_date FROM policy_details ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT document_name FROM policy_documents WHERE policy_id = 1001
SELECT * FROM policy_holders
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM policy_holders WHERE address='123 Main St'
SELECT policy_id, first_name, last_name, start_date FROM policy_holders JOIN policy_details ON policy_holders.policy_id = policy_details.policy_id
SELECT * FROM policy_holders WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, start_date, end_date FROM policy_details WHERE premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM PolicyHolder;
SELECT id, name, email FROM PolicyHolder ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT phone FROM PolicyHolder WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM PolicyContract WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, end_date FROM PolicyContract WHERE amount > 5000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyHolder WHERE id = 1;

SELECT ph.name, pc.amount, pd.document_type FROM PolicyHolder ph JOIN PolicyContract pc ON ph.id = pc.holder_id JOIN PolicyDocument pd ON pc.policy_id = pd.policy_id WHERE pd.document_type = 'Insurance';

SELECT pl.log_id, pl.log_date, pl.action, ph.name FROM PolicyLog pl JOIN PolicyContract pc ON pl.policy_id = pc.policy_id JOIN PolicyHolder ph ON pc.holder_id = ph.id WHERE pl.user_id = 101 ORDER BY pl.log_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT ph.email FROM PolicyHolder ph JOIN PolicyContract pc ON ph.id = pc.holder_id WHERE pc.amount > 5000;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs, SUM(pc.amount) AS total_amount FROM PolicyLog pl JOIN PolicyContract pc ON pl.policy_id = pc.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM policy_holders;
SELECT id, name, address FROM policy_holders ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_documents WHERE document_type='Insurance';
SELECT policy_name, start_date, premium_amount FROM policy_details WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, issue_date, resolved FROM policy_issues WHERE resolved = FALSE ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_holders ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT policy_name, start_date, premium_amount FROM policy_details WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, issue_date, issue_description FROM policy_issues WHERE resolved = FALSE ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT name, age, address FROM policy_holders WHERE age > 30 AND policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT policy_name, end_date, premium_amount FROM policy_details ORDER BY end_date ASC;
